author: faraz3920
content: hello what is the best way to have eth2 testnet running locally on VMs for testing.

author: parithosh
content:
You could use one of the following tools based on what you're comfortable with:
- Kurtosis, specify testnet as a json config: https://github.com/kurtosis-tech/eth2-merge-kurtosis-module
- Kubernetes Helm charts, needs a few config steps: https://github.com/skylenet/ethereum-helm-charts/
- Ansible, needs a lot of config steps: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-deployment-ansible
- Bash script from lighthouse team, unsure of config level needed: https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/tree/stable/scripts/local_testnet
- Bash script from nimbus team, unsure of config level needed: https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/blob/stable/scripts/launch_local_testnet.sh
- Other teams probably have such scripts too, you might need to snoop a little bit ðŸ™‚
